::KItKat::

She looked up from her glass and at Destructor. "I don't want to 
clone our warriors.  I want to make one clone. Just one. And with a 
little luck, I will make it perfect." She smiled. "I had the idea of 
fighting fire with fire. Megatron made a clone of himself. So I want 
to make a clone. One of Megatron. I figure if I work things right, I 
can send my clone of Megatron into his base, once we find it that is, 
and hopefully kill the real Megatron. Then take control of his 
group.  With him out of the way, we can start to consolidate the 
Predacons.  Make one huge Predacon force, then take over the 
maximals. WE could win the war if all the Predacons united and fought 
as one team, one unit, one group."  She then started staring at her 
glass again.  "We can't win a battle let alone the war if we are 
always fighing amonst ourselves.  That's how the Maximals have 
survived this long.  They all stick together.  Predacons as a whole 
out number the Maximals, but untill we stop fighting amonst ourselves 
and act as one big group, we will never put an end to the war."  she 
took a deep sigh,"I don't care if I lead them to victory or not.  If 
there is another bot that is a better leader, then so be it. but we 
must unite to win.  All the preds. That is why I want that replicator 
to work. I first need to get rid of Megatron.  And I was hoping to 
use his own clone against him."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor walked into the mess hall and sat down with Kit Kat. He 
had some 
> questions for her. He got completely serious...something he had 
trouble doing 
> around her..."Why do you wish to clone our warriors? It seems the 
only idea 
> you can have at your requsest for the replicators. I want you to 
think before 
> you realize the dangers of what might happen" All he could think 
about at 
> this point was what one treacherous pred could do to a team but 
make more of 
> the same. It was not his favorite idea.
